name: Circle of the Land
description: Mystics who draw power from the land where they were initiated.

2.name: Circle Spells
2.description: Gain extra spells at levels 3,5,7 and 9 based on your chosen terrain; always prepared.

2.name: Natural Recovery
2.description: During a short rest, recover spell slots with a combined level up to half your druid level (rounded up).

6.name: Land's Stride
6.description: Move through nonmagical difficult terrain and plants without penalty and gain advantage against plants that impede movement.

10.name: Nature's Ward
10.description: You can't be charmed or frightened by elementals or fey and are immune to poison and disease.

14.name: Nature's Sanctuary
14.description: Beasts and plants must succeed on a Wisdom save to attack you; on a failure they must choose another target.

choices.name: Circle of the Land Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Circle of the Land subclass
